page.title: 14The Horndon Society
page.content: The Horndon-on-the-Hill Society is an independent organisation, which anyone who has an interest in the Village, may join. Its purpose is to premote the conservation and enhancement of land and buildings in and around the Village, wherever possible, for the benefit of the Villagers and the visitors. The Society helps the Village in two ways:- by raising money mostly from the Feast and Fair, for particular enhancement schemes and by representations to the local Authority and other relevant bodies about things which can be done to help the Village retain or enhance its special appearance, rural character and community spirit. It has been engaged in many varied enhancement and protection projects in the Village.
